name: 人偶doll
description:
A relaxing story(which may contain a little blood, but still relaxing) that happened in a cold winter night. If you couldn't sleep, it might be a good choice;).

Game Details
  • 25–50 minutes of playing
  • 8 endings in total
  • potentially bad grammar
  • lofi everything
  • uploaded for educational purpose
